short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forces the Zoom to be set to 100%

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This sets the zoom to 100 if at any point it is changed away from that to keep zoom fixed to 100%. This does not change the default zoom level, but sets it back to 100% if it is ever changed.
